document.full_text: the u.s. interior department said on friday it approved a permit for statoil  to drill for oil in the deep waters of the gulf of mexico.
document.title: u.s. oks 6th deepwater drill permit since bp spill
lines_and_colors: the u.s. interior department said on friday it approved a permit for statoil  to drill for oil in the deep waters of the gulf of mexico.
